name: EQLRipple
0:
”Alexa, ask ripple control it is too dark”
”Alexa, ask ripple control the temperature in the living room”
”Alexa, ask ripple control to turn on the air purifier in the living room”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ripple control
des:
Ripple is the smart home category products made by EQL Technology, the series includes Ripple Control(central hub), smart plug, smart light bulb, PM2.5 dust detector, air purifier…etc., with AVS integrated, users will be able to control these smart gadgets by talking to Amazon Echo/Alexa, such as turning on/off plug, light and air purifier.
To enjoy the EQL Ripple Skill, users must have
- one Ripple Control(central hub) which is used to connect to cloud(WiFi) and Ripple smart gadgets(BLE)
- at least one Ripple series smart gadget 
- EQL Ripple App(iOS or Android)
- one Alexa device(Amazon Echo, Dot…etc.)
